_header: To show that I have not forgotten you
_description:
Charles d’Orléans, a roundel, translated from the French (Champollion-Figeac (1842)
XChampollion-Figeac, Aime. Les Poesies du duc Charles d’Orleans. Paris, 1842, 114) — 14 lines

BLHar682.First Lines:
TO shewe that y haue not forgoten yowBut redy am to serue yow lady
                    dere…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…This poore song y sende it to yow hereSo takith hit in gre y
                    pray yow now
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
